page.title: 13OCCUPATIONS AROUND CATTERICK
page.content: The area boasts of only one shop dealing with arts and crafts. The emphasis being on paintings done by local artists. However, crafts in abundance can be found in many homes. Knitting, Crochet, Sewing, Tatting, Quilting, Tailoring, Flower Arranging, Metal Work, Woodwork, Leather work and Hand carving. Most of these crafts are taught at evening institutes held in village halls and local schools. The tutors of these classes are paid by the local education authority and must have gained the necassary qualifications. Anyone can hire a village hall and run a class of their choice and indeed such classes are popular. The most popular pastime is painting, the beauty of the area inspiring both local artists and visitors to indulge in their hobby.
